about_the_game:
This is a PvE Co-op game, in which you can gather a group up to 4 players to try crack the mystery behind the abandoned town. While exploring, SCARECROW will try to hunt the players. And by using the environment or the assets smartly, players have to evade the monster from time to time and meanwhile complete certain tasks to seek the secrets. Once the secrets was revealed, players could then made the final cure to end their nightmare.

Features
Co-op(up to 4 players): You can start a game with 1-4 players. You can either enjoy the game with friends or give yourself a bit of challenge by playing solo.

Variety of experiences: The experiences could be varied due to the change of the player numbers. For example, sneaking and running might be the wise option when playing solo, while sending a ‘warrior’ to grab SCARECROW’s attention may be proved to be useful when playing with a team. Also, the items and the weapons will spawn in different locations in each game, which further create uncertainty to your each time’s experience.

Customized difficulties: Find the game’s hardly any challenge? Or find the process too complicated when you are still struggling to learn the basics? Don’t worry, you can always adjust the game to the way you like. SCARECROW could be more perceptive and aggressive, the details and numbers of the tasks can be changed, just customize the game to fit your own pace.

Environment: Besides the weapons, some of the elements in the environment (such as the electric boxes) can be used to stall or to evade SCARECROW. But beware, these ‘traps’ could backfire.

Anger system: Players could try different styles of clearing the game. You can try sneak and focus on the objectives, or you can confront SCARECROW directly and piss him off. But be advised, SCARECROW will decide how he treat you accordingly, thus being brave might result in a quicker death.

Replay and unlock: You can unlock new character by replaying the game.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 - 64 bit
  • Processor: Intel i5 or new-gen i3 / AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 970 / AMD Radeon R9 290
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 - 64 bit
  • Processor: Intel i7 or AMD equivalent (AMD FX 9500+ Series)
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1070/ AMD Radeon RX 5700 XT
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 10 GB available space

short_description: You are to enter an abandoned town to explore the secret of missing persons, as the monster responsible for it finds its new victims and poses constant challenges in the process. This horror style PvE Co-op game features in chase & run as well as co-op experience.
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Russian, Japanese, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Portuguese - Brazil, Portuguese - Portugal, Spanish - Latin America, Korean
